arStrings.szText: The Dark Citadel is a new activity requiring 2-4 players. Use Party Finder to find allies and face the many trials within!
Earn a weekly Dark Citadel Challenger's Cache for completing all 3 Wings on any Torment Tier!
Slay the Khazra's Treasury Guardians to receive additional Citadel Coins at the end of specific trials!
Waymarkers are assigned via the emote wheel and can be used to communicate specific areas within the Dark Citadel.
